author: KarolWes
title: Small Falcon
review:
Gift with Lego Star Wars Magazine Issue 7/19

Model

Ship is built really simple, but looks accurate. Most of shapes are done well, there are a few details that gives more finished look. There are many uncovered studs, but it isn't so bad. I like how LEGO made cockpit and escape pods. Top turret is perfect, satellite from studs looks weird. Overall it is a nice model.

Parts

Falcon is rounded so there are four rounded plate and some rounded tiles. Parts are mostly white. There are also three quite new part - Bracket 1 x 1 - 1 x 1 Inverted in dark gray.

Summary

Set is nice source of rather new parts for low price. Model also looks ok, and is good addition to rest of magazine gift microscale models.
